Title: Tesla continues to circle the drain
URL: https://www.theverge.com/news/675058/tesla-europe-april-sales-musk-doge-brand-crisis
Description: We don’t typically report on monthly sales data for one car company in one market, but this one seems particularly notable given all that’s going on in the world. In another sign that Elon Musk’s company is in a real tough spot, Tesla is getting absolutely de…

content.response:
Here are some recent news articles about Tesla:

1. **Tesla continues to circle the drain**
   - [Read more](https://www.theverge.com/news/675058/tesla-europe-april-sales-musk-doge-brand-crisis)
   - Description: This article discusses Tesla's challenging situation in the market, particularly focusing on its sales data and the current state of the company.

2. **Xiaomi’s new PU7 spells trouble for Tesla in China**
   - [Read more](https://www.theverge.com/news/673023/xiaomi-pu7-ev-suv-china-tesla-model-y)
   - Description: Xiaomi has unveiled its PU7 electric SUV, which poses a potential threat to Tesla's dominance in the Chinese electric vehicle market.

3. **Xiaomi’s new YU7 spells trouble for Tesla in China**
   - [Read more](https://www.theverge.com/news/673023/xiaomi-yu7-ev-suv-china-tesla-model-y)
   - Description: Similar to the PU7, the YU7 electric SUV from Xiaomi is another competitor that could impact Tesla's market position in China.

4. **What if Tesla made a Slate-like EV instead of the Cybertruck?**
   - [Read more](https://www.theverge.com/tesla/672120/slate-truck-tesla-cybertruck-what-if)
   - Description: This article explores a hypothetical scenario where Tesla creates a vehicle inspired by the Slate, rather than the Cybertruck.

5. **Tesla’s iPhone app now supports Live Activities for Supercharging**
   - [Read more](https://www.theverge.com/news/676070/tesla-supercharger-apple-iphone-live-activites-status-child)
   - Description: Tesla has updated its iOS app to allow users to monitor their Supercharging progress directly from their phone's lock screen.

Feel free to check out the articles for more detailed information!
